source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW nsip_relevant_reps_new 

    AS

SELECT

T1.CaseReference,
T1.CaseUniqueId,
T1.ContactID,
T1.OrganisationName,
T1.JobTitle,
T1.FullName,
T1.PhoneNumber,
T1.EmailAddress,
T1.BuildingNumber,
T1.Street,
T1.Town,
T1.County,
T1.Country,
T1.Postcode,
T1.NSIPRelevantRepresentationID as RelevantRepID,
T1.AttendPrelimMeeting,
T1.DateReceived,
T1.Notes,
T1.AgentContactId,
T1.RepresentAtCompAcqHearing,
T1.RepresentAtIssueHearing,
T1.RepresentAtOpenFloorHearing,
T1.RepresentationOriginal,
T1.RepresentationRedacted,
T1.SubmitLaterReps,
T1.WebReference,
T1.RelevantRepStatus as RelevantRepresentationStatus,
T1.OwnerOrOccupier,
T1.PowerToSell,
T1.EntitledToClaim,
T1.Other,
T1.DescriptionIfOther,
T1.RelRepOnBehalfOf,
T1.RelRepOrganisation,
T1.PreferredContactMethod,
T1.RowID,
T1.IsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_relevant_representation_dim T1
WHERE T1.IsActive = 'Y'

# View nsip_relevant_reps_new is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. RelevantRepID), update rows
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_curated.nsip_relevant_reps is updated

%%sql

-- merge into nsip_relevant_reps table

MERGE INTO odw_curated_db.nsip_relevant_reps AS Target
USING nsip_relevant_reps_new AS Source

ON Source.RelevantRepID = Target.RelevantRepID

WHEN MATCHED AND Source.RowID<>Target.RowID
    THEN
    UPDATE SET *
WHEN NOT MATCHED
    THEN
    INSERT *
